shortdesc.ph: Occurs when the state of the local user's audio mixing file changes.

section.p: When you call the \ref IRtcEngine::startAudioMixing "startAudioMixing" method and the state of audio mixing file changes, the SDK triggers this callback.
If the local audio mixing file does not exist, or if the SDK does not support the file format or cannot access the music file URL, the SDK returns WARN_AUDIO_MIXING_OPEN_ERROR = 701.

plentry.pd: The states of the local user's audio mixing file.
